about_the_game:
Step into the shadows and experience a taste of the epic battle against darkness in this playable demo of Shadow Breakers. In this limited experience, you will:

  • Play as Ultra, one of the elite fighters tasked with combating shadow demons.

  • Explore a small section of the open-world environment, showcasing the game's atmospheric design and dynamic gameplay.

  • Solve a few engaging puzzles and complete mini-quests that provide a glimpse into the full game's mechanics.

  • Engage in combat with several shadow demon NPCs, testing your skills with Ultra's unique abilities.

  • Challenge a boss fight, offering an intense and rewarding climax to the demo if you can make it to the end.

This demo provides 30 to 45 minutes of gameplay and introduces key elements of Shadow Breakers, including combat, exploration, and story-driven missions. Prepare for an action-packed preview that sets the stage for the full game.

  • Engage in combat with several shadow demon NPCs, testing your skills with Ultra's unique abilities.

  • Challenge a boss fight, offering an intense and rewarding climax to the demo if you can make it to the end.

This demo provides 30 to 45 minutes of gameplay and introduces key elements of Shadow Breakers, including combat, exploration, and story-driven missions. Prepare for an action-packed preview that sets the stage for the full game.
name: Shadow Breakers Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500k (4 core 3.3 GHz) or AMD Ryzen 3 1200 (4 core 3.1 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 (4 GB) or AMD R9 290X (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
  • VR Support: n/a
  • Additional Notes: n/a
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600k (4 core 3.5 GHz) or AMD Ryzen 5 2400 G (4 core 3.6 GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 (6 GB) or AMD RX 580 (4 GB)
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
  • VR Support: n/a
  • Additional Notes: n/a

short_description: In the Shadow Breakers demo, play as Ultra and explore a portion of the open world. Solve puzzles, complete quests, battle shadow demons, and face a challenging boss fight in this 30-45 minute preview of the action-packed fight against darkness.
